https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ottNCTudQGme99qvM7G2SCBbHHO.jpg Salman and Jean-Ryad, two gay beurs, dream of leaving their suburbs for the capital. Karim, Salman's childhood friend, heterosexual with a tendency to exhibisionism, is looking for roommates. A voluptuous climate will quickly reign over the beurs' apartment, until Jean-Ryad receives strange calls from a certain Seif and the visit of Jad, the troubling Lebanese neighbor. Beurs appart'
